one_reviews_text: I have enjoyed the single player campaign, I will eventually get 100% on it!! I am hoping to try out the multiplayer soon! Great VR title but nothing revolutionary. Reccomend if your looking for something fun for kids or for a value price!
great game, spent lots of time getting 100% on every level. i wasnt happy til i stopped everything.

Compared to games like Defence Grid 2 this has a real real long way to go. Not enough tower spots. Enemies advance faster than you can make money to upgrade. You can't pass a level (other than the first 2) without taking some sort of damage.  I look around and see little chests and stuff in the senery, How about being able to find little bonuses by finding things like that? Its early release so I hope for more. It has potential.

review_title: Pretty but not really exploiting VR
one_reviews_text: Ok tower defense, with very slow ramp up, pretty graphics. But why should this be a VR game and not just a standard 3D PC game? Ultimately didn't hook me like other VR titles.

Wt F in the A is wrong with you. The last board. Why are you cheating. I won but the game says draw. But when the game won first then it is defeat for me. I did win. Just because you don't got more boards then you don't have to cheet. But the game is fun. It is a theme in many games, on the last board the game cheats. :D SPOILER ALERT. Guys, if you want to beat the game almost every time then always stack 2 flame towers together, it eats them like cow eating grass.
